title: Did George Clooney Slam Trump and His Talk of a ‘Hollywood Elite’?
subtitle: In late 2020, the world-famous actor and director was quoted as calling the outgoing president a "guy who takes a s--- in a gold toilet."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: George Clooney once launched a diatribe against Donald Trump, describing the actor's own modest background, accusing Trump of hypocrisy, and saying "F--- you."
